AttackStance.name: stance-defensive
AttackStance.description: Defensive unit stance (unit chases a little, before returning to position)

AttackStance.name: stance-stand-ground
AttackStance.description: Units do not move from position

Difficulty.name: moderate
Difficulty.description: The difficulty of a novice player

Difficulty.name: hard
Difficulty.description: The difficulty of an experienced player

Difficulty.name: hardest
Difficulty.description: The hardest difficulty in the game. AI's might cheat

DifficultyParam.name: ability-to-dodge-missiles
DifficultyParam.description: Chance of a computer player's unit dodging a missile (range: 0-100, default: 100)

DifficultyParam.name: ability-to-maintain-distance
DifficultyParam.description: Chance that a computer player's ranged unit will maintain the distance (range: 0-100, default:100)

DiplomaticStance.name: ally
DiplomaticStance.description: Player(s) that are allied to computer player

DiplomaticStance.name: enemy
DiplomaticStance.description: Player(s) that are enemied to computer player

DiplomaticStance.name: neutral
DiplomaticStance.description: Player(s) that are neutral to coputer player

ExploredState.name: explored-yes
ExploredState.description: Point explored, but not currently visible

FindPlayerMethod.name: find-ordered
FindPlayerMethod.description: (?) Find next player in a given category

MapType.name: arabia
MapType.description: Notoriously open map with resources more thinly spread.

MapType.name: archipelago
MapType.description: A series of islands surrounded by a large ocean.

MapType.name: baltic
MapType.description: A sea surrounded by a medium-sized piece of land on all sides.

MapType.name: black-forest
MapType.description: A very closed off map due to the high volume of trees.

MapType.name: coastal
MapType.description: On average, half-water and half-land, with reduced resources on land.

MapType.name: continental
MapType.description: A circular, giant island, surrounded by water.

MapType.name: crater-lake
MapType.description: An island brimming with gold in the center of a caldera lake. Steep elevation and lack of trees make it hard to build there.

MapType.name: fortress
MapType.description: A walled city with gates and all the buildings you need to build up your forces quickly.

MapType.name: gold-rush
MapType.description: A whole heap of gold and a few wolves in the middle of a desert.

MapType.name: highland
MapType.description: Far from the ocean and heavily forested but with plenty of rivers and open space for maneuvers.

MapType.name: islands
MapType.description: Each player starts alone on an island; uninhabited islands may be rich with resources so be prepared to rule the sea.

MapType.name: mediterranean
MapType.description: An inland sea surrounded by land; sounds deceptively peaceful.

MapType.name: migration
MapType.description: A tiny island that can't support you for long before you must move to the mainland, where the fighting is fierce.

MapType.name: rivers
MapType.description: Players are isolated by narrow rivers; numerous shallows must be guarded at all cost.

MapType.name: team-islands
MapType.description: Each team is placed on their own island. The map is mostly water with some land.

ObjectData.name: object-data-tasks-count
ObjectData.description: Object tasks count (increased for internal tasks performed on the object, i.e. may be more than 1 per event)

ObjectData.name: object-data-attacker-count
ObjectData.description: Object number of attackers (note increased for certain situations like hunting)

ObjectData.name: object-data-attacker-id
ObjectData.description: Object attacker ID (not set for situations like hunting)

ObjectData.name: object-data-under-attack
ObjectData.description: Object is under attack (not set for certian situations like hunting)

ObjectData.name: object-data-attack-timer
ObjectData.description: Object timer that resets to 60s for each attack (buildings only)

ObjectData.name: object-data-on-mainland
ObjectData.description: Object is on the mainland (compares map-zone-id to home TC map-zone-id)

ObjectData.name: object-data-next-attack
ObjectData.description: Time until object's next attack (in milliseconds)

ObjectData.name: object-data-target-time
ObjectData.description: Object target time (in milliseconds, not for villagers)

ObjectData.name: object-data-gather-type
ObjectData.description: food, wood, gold, stone or -1 for none

ObjectData.name: object-data-language-id
ObjectData.description: Can be used to check villager types

ObjectData.name: object-data-group-flag
ObjectData.description: Group ID from 0-9 or -2 for none

ObjectData.name: object-data-hero
ObjectData.description: Object has actual hero flag set

ObjectData.name: object-data-frame-delay
ObjectData.description: Number of frames for projectile delay

ObjectData.name: object-data-to-precise
ObjectData.description: Precise distance to a precise target-point

PlayerID.name: every-ally
PlayerID.description: All allied players, computer and human

PlayerID.name: every-enemy
PlayerID.description: Every enemy player, computer or human

PlayerID.name: every-neutral
PlayerID.description: Every neutral stanced player, computer and human

ResearchState.name: research-available
ResearchState.description: Checks that the given research is available to computer player's civ, and research is available at this time (tech tree prerequisites are met).

ResearchState.name: research-complete
ResearchState.description: This fact checks that the given research is completed.

ResearchState.name: research-unavailable
ResearchState.description: Checks given research is unavailable to computer player's civ, or research is unavailable at this time (tech tree prerequisites are not met).

TargetAction.name: action-unload
TargetAction.description: Buildings ungarrison to gather point, siege (913) eject in-place, transports to target-point

TargetAction.name: action-ungarrison
TargetAction.description: Selected units from inside an object are ungarrisoned

TimerState.name: timer-triggered
TimerState.description: Checks whether a given timer has triggered

VictoryCond.name: conquest
VictoryCond.description: Must destroy all enemy military and villager units and buildings

VictoryCond.name: time-limit
VictoryCond.description: The game will end after a specified time

VictoryCond.name: custom
VictoryCond.description: Defined by the map being played

Instruction.name: defrule
Instruction.description: Defines the start of a new rule

Instruction.name: load
notes: Takes a single filename of form './relative/path/to/file' without the '.per' extension.
